children.name: Hasan ibn Ali
children.notes: Had several children, including Hasan al-Muthanna, Zayd ibn Hasan, and Umm al-Husayn.

children.name: Husayn ibn Ali
children.notes: Had several children, including Ali Zayn al-Abidin, Ali al-Akbar, and Fatimah al-Kubra.

children.name: Zaynab bint Ali
children.notes: Married Abdullah ibn Ja'far and had several children.

children.name: Umm Kulthum bint Ali
children.notes: Married Umar ibn al-Khattab and had two children: Zayd ibn Umar and Ruqayyah bint Umar.
